contest-event.event-date: Feb. 3, 1974 D Durham League Contest (Section A) Durham League Contest (Section A) 10 Test Piece Contest Durham League Contest durham-league-contest-section-a The 2010 contest, due to take place on 5th December, was cancelled due to heavy snow. (4barsrest news article) Journey into Freedom Welfare Hall, Easington Prizes - 1st £18 and trophy, 2nd £10 and cup, 3rd £5 and trophy. 9 bands competed. May 18, 2010, 2:21 p.m. Jan. 20, 2017, 5:27 p.m. 1 Reg Vardy Band Eric Cunningham 2 Easington Colliery Band Cecil Peacock 3 Crookhall Colliery Ray White 4 Westoe Band Cliff Sayers Unknown Result Washington Welfare George Rowell Unknown Result Yarm & District Band C.
